name: 名稱
select-trigger-hint: 從列表中點擊觸發器以查看其詳情
cron-help: 格式: 分 時 日 月 週 (例如: 0 */1 * * * = 每小時)
cron-invalid-format: 無效的 Cron 格式。預期格式: 分 時 日 月 週 (例如: 0 */1 * * *)
cron-invalid-minute: 無效的分鐘值。必須為 0-59 或有效的 Cron 表達式
cron-invalid-hour: 無效的小時值。必須為 0-23 或有效的 Cron 表達式
cron-invalid-day: 無效的日期值。必須為 1-31 或有效的 Cron 表達式
cron-invalid-month: 無效的月份值。必須為 1-12 或有效的 Cron 表達式
cron-invalid-weekday: 無效的星期值。必須為 0-6 (0=星期日) 或有效的 Cron 表達式
task-prompt-placeholder: 輸入此觸發器的任務提示詞
webhook-created-subtitle: 您的新 Webhook 觸發器已準備好接收請求
webhook-instructions: 使用下方 URL 觸發此智能體。發送帶有任意 JSON 主體的請求。
webhook-tip-description: 您可以在 JSON 負載中包含自定義數據，並在任務提示詞中使用 {{variable_name}} 引用它。
webhook-url-copied: Webhook URL 已複製到剪貼板
confirm-delete: 確定要刪除此觸發器嗎？
webhook-copied: Webhook URL 已複製到剪貼板
failed-to-copy: 複製 Webhook URL 失敗
invalid-time-format: 無效的時間格式。請使用 HH:MM (例如: 09:30)
schedule-day-of-month-note: If the selected day doesn’t exist in that month (e.g., the 31st), the task will be skipped.
no-upcoming-one-time: 請選擇未來的日期和時間
weekday-required: At least one weekday is required
schedule-required-fields: Please fill in all required fields for the schedule
create-trigger-agent: 使用觸發器自動化任務
webhook-url-after-creation: 創建後您可以在觸發器詳情中找到 Webhook URL。
title: 觸發器
create-hint: 創建一個觸發器以自動化您的任務
confirm-delete-message: 確定要刪除 "{{name}}" 嗎？此操作無法撤回。

dynamic.credentials-notice: Your credentials are stored securely and used to authenticate with the service.
dynamic.no-config-available: No configuration available for this trigger type

validation.max-length: Must be no more than {{max}} characters
validation.pattern-mismatch: Value does not match required pattern

slack.save-credentials-first: Save credentials first to load channels
slack.channels-fetch-error: Failed to fetch channels. Please check your credentials.

authentication_required.label: Require Authentication
authentication_required.notice: Slack triggers require authentication to verify webhook signatures (Slack Signing Secret required). Verify webhook endpoint at https://api.slack.com/apps to activate trigger.

bot_token.label: Slack Bot Token
bot_token.notice: Your Slack Bot User OAuth Token (starts with xoxb-)

signing_secret.label: Slack Signing Secret
signing_secret.notice: Your Slack app's signing secret used to verify requests

events.label: Event Types
events.notice: Select which Slack events should trigger this workflow

channel_id.label: Channel ID
channel_id.notice: Specific channel to watch (leave empty to watch all channels)

ignore_users.label: Ignore Users
ignore_users.notice: Slack user IDs to ignore messages from

verification-required: Pending Verification. A valid event message is required for Trigger Activation or disable trigger Authentication.

authentication_required.label: Require Authentication
authentication_required.notice: Whether authentication is required for this trigger

message_filter.label: Message Filter (Regex)
message_filter.placeholder: Enter regex pattern to filter messages...
message_filter.notice: Use regex patterns to filter which messages trigger the workflow

authentication_required.label: Require Authentication
authentication_required.notice: Whether authentication is required for this webhook trigger

body_contains.label: Body Contains
body_contains.placeholder: Enter text that must be in request body...
body_contains.notice: Only trigger if the request body contains this string

required_headers.label: Required Headers
required_headers.notice: List of HTTP headers that must be present in the request

header_match.label: Header Match (Regex)
header_match.notice: Match request headers against a regex pattern (format: Header-Name: pattern)

include_headers.label: Include Headers
include_headers.notice: Include request headers in the workflow execution input

include_request_metadata.label: Include Request Metadata
include_request_metadata.notice: Include request metadata (method, URL, client IP) in execution input
